General.Name: Shanghai Yct Electronics Group Co.Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai YCT Electronics Group Co.,Ltd distributes electronic products in China. It offers active/passive components in the fields of automotive, industrial, and electric power, as well as in-vehicle infotainment and navigation solutions. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Room 402-405, No. 62, Chunguang Road, Shanghai, China, 201108
